room_title: Escape room "The Vampire's Tomb" by Lock & Key Escape Room in Buffalo
room_description:
An ancient evil stalks the countryside! You and your fellow band of vampire hunters had been tracking the activity of a vampire for months.  Your detective skills have uncovered his identity and brought you to the doorstep of the vampire's manor.  

Night approaches so time is of the essence. You'll need to find the location of his tomb before night falls and the monster awakens!
